required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study Comparing the Bioequivalence of Triamcinolone Acetonide Aqueous Nasal Spray (Apotex, Inc.) to That of Nasacort® AQ Nasal Spray (Sanofi-Aventis Pharmaceutical Products, Inc.) In the Treatment of Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis

brief_summary.textblock: A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled parallel-group study, comparing the bioequivalence of triamcinolone acetonide aqueous nasal spray (Apotex, Inc.) to that of Nasacort® AQ nasal spray (Sanofi-Aventis Pharmaceutical Products, Inc.) in the treatment of seasonal allergic rhinitis.

primary_outcome.measure: To demonstrate similar efficacy (bioequivalence) of the generic triamcinolone acetonide aqueous nasal spray (Apotex, Inc.) with that of the marketed reference drug, Nasacort® AQ Nasal Spray in the treatment of seasonal allergic rhinitis.

intervention.intervention_name: triamcinolone acetonide aqueous nasal spray (Apotex Inc.)
intervention.description: It is to be self-administered; the dosing regimen will be 2 sprays (actuations) into each nostril, once daily. This is the dosing regimen during placebo lead-in and randomized treatment phases. Each actuation of active treatment is equivalent to 55 ug of triamcinolone acetonide, for a total daily dose of 220ug triamcinolone acetonide per day.

intervention.intervention_name: triamcinolone acetonide aqueous nasal spray (Nasacort® AQ)
intervention.description: It is to be self-administered; the dosing regimen will be 2 sprays (actuations) into each nostril, once daily. This is the dosing regimen during placebo lead-in and randomized treatment phases. Each actuation of active treatment is equivalent to 55 ug of triamcinolone acetonide, for a total daily dose of 220ug triamcinolone acetonide per day.

Each actuation of active treatment is equivalent to 55 ug of triamcinolone acetonide, for a total daily dose of 220ug triamcinolone acetonide per day.
